casebody.data:
No. 10-5211. Jason Loadholt, Petitioner v. Massachusetts. 562 U.S. 956, 131 S. Ct. 459,

178 L. Ed. 2d 282,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8076. October 12, 2010.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Judicial Court of Massachusetts. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the Supreme Judicial Court of Massachusetts for further consideration in light of McDonald v. Chicago, 561 U.S. 742, 130 S. Ct. 3020, 177 L. Ed. 2d 894 (2010).

Same case below, 456 Mass. 411, 923 N.E.2d 1037.
